channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia is speeding into a demographic crisis with a 25-year-low birth rate as the Ukraine war rages on
item.description: Russia has had similar troughs in its demographics during World War II and after the fall of the Soviet Union—but things are different this time.

item.title: Chipotle admits to raising prices—the same day a top analyst spotted a protein price hike at 20% of its stores
item.description: The fast-casual Mexican chain has taken some heat for its inconsistent portion sizes, but analysts see better days ahead for Chipotle.

item.title: Trump’s Social Security pick has no government experience. Can he handle it?
Does the market want a strong or weak jobs report Friday? Traders aren’t sure
item.description: Market observers can make both sides of the argument — whether a strong or a weak November payroll release would do the most to boost sentiment, and p...

item.title: UniCredit's Orcel could still sweeten his bid and take on a double M&A offensive
item.description: Divided between two takeover courtships, UniCredit's Andrea Orcel may need to decide between going big abroad or staying home.

item.title: Ulta Beauty shares pop as retailer beats earnings expectations despite demand fears
item.description: The retailer hiked its full-year outlook slightly to reflect the better-than-expected results.

item.title: What’s next after bitcoin tops $100K? What one top Wall Street technician says.
Trump names David Sacks as White House AI and crypto czar
item.description: In Sacks, Trump is tapping one of his most prominent Silicon Valley supporters and fundraisers for a prime position in his administration

item.title: Ken Griffin says crypto is exploding right now because more people want to have ‘agency’ in their lives
item.description: “Of course, I wish I bought something that trades at 100 times the price it traded at a few years ago,” Griffin said.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare head’s killing shines light on health-insurance denial rates
Trump names David Sacks as White House ‘AI and crypto czar’
A tech company saw blockbuster results from U.K.’s first medical trial of a 4-day workweek. Yet, it’s ditching the model for one key reason
item.description: Before making four-day workweek the norm, there's a need for a “widespread cultural change across the U.K.,” Thrive's co-CEO said.

item.title: Dow closes below 45,000 as stocks pause rally ahead of jobs report
Trump says venture capitalist David Sacks will be AI and crypto 'czar'
item.description: David Sacks spoke at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee in July and hosted a fundraiser for Trump in San Francisco.

item.title: SpaceX faces opposition to Starlink expansion from Ukrainian group concerned about Musk
item.description: A Ukrainian-American group filed a petition with the FCC to try and keep Starlink from putting almost 22,500 satellites into orbit until further revie...
